body:
Many commands already accepts anonymous specs that are used to query the db for a constraint based selection. What is the general sentiment on extending this to `spack find`, i.e. allowing for something like:

```
# finds all the installed packages that depends on openmpi
spack find ^openmpi 

# finds all the packages that are compiled with intel
spack find %intel 
```

?
title: spack find : make it accept anonymous specs for v0.10 ?
